sentence: Speaker, I rise today for the fourth time to call  for funding for lifesaving food aid to be restored by the Trump  administration.
title: Support for Edesia

sentence: The recissions in this bill will cut  lifesaving  food assistance for families, emergency services for families fleeing  conflict, agriculture development programs, and core nutrition services  for children under five--just to name a few.
title: Rescissions Act of 2025

sentence: In my district in North Kingstown, Rhode Island, there is a warehouse  with 90,000 boxes of Plumpy'Nut, lifesaving food aid that is designed  to save the lives of starving children whose organs are shutting down  and can no longer process conventional food.
title: Plumpy'nut Saves Lives

sentence: Speaker, I rise today, for the 39th time, to call  on the Trump administration to restore lifesaving food aid for children  around the world.
title: Restore Lifesaving Food Aid

sentence: Speaker, I rise today for the 30th time to call on  the Trump administration to restore lifesaving food aid for starving  children.
title: Edesia Product Still in Warehouse

sentence: Speaker, I rise today for the seventh time to call  on the Trump administration to restore funding for lifesaving food aid  for malnourished children.
title: Impact of Volatility and Policy Reversals

sentence: Speaker, today, I rise for the 40th time to call  on the Trump administration to restore lifesaving food aid for  malnourished children.
